content: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êPLEASE SHOW NUMBER OF CHARACTERS IN ANSWER AFTER QUESTION.‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê EG. 4-6 (hyphenated word), 6 (single word), 1.1.1 (acronym).???

Reinstalled on new Android tablet. It remembered the volumes I purchased, but did not remember that I had solved them. Now the home screen is cluttered with volumes waiting to be solved. Just a small nit.
Great fun. Some challenging. Some easy.

I had problems with the app (it wouldn't open) I cleared the app cache & it started working again. I love these puzzles! I've been doing these for years & had to give them up after 2 surgeries on my right hand (I can't write very long anymore) Penny press is my favorite thank you! Now that I can get them on my phone I can finally do them again. The price for the volumes is very reasonable. (Almost half the cost when ordered by mail). I hope you keep them coming I do lots of them!
fun. i play the daily puzzle every day
Challenging but fun
enjoy doing games with extra time on hands.
I enjoy these acrostics! Good mix of puzzles. The ads are not intrusive.
I love acrostics, and this has several levels of difficulty.
So much fun! Good mental workout without the constant pressure to empty your wallet!

I would give 5 stars, but it would be nice to be able to go back into the puzzle to see all of the answers. Also, it seems odd that I have to exit the game to get the next group of puzzles. But otherwise, very well done and fun to play.
replyContent: Hi Tiffany, FYI, you can see any completed puzzle anytime. Tap ">" to the right of the volume and you'll see a list of puzzles and their status. You can open any of them, finished or not, to view the puzzle again.  I think I see what you mean about making Next Puzzle work better. I'll take a look at that. Thanks! Cheers, Michael

content: A challenge that goes deeper than crosswords... The interface is easy while the puzzles can be hard.
Relaxing and addictive!!!
Fun way to learn new things
These are good and challenging!! I have always loved acrostics!
Worth the two bucks. Some of the starter puzzles nastily hard, but overall a good mix. Play with the display to get your preferred version- mine is having the key visible in the middle.
Great puzzles! Love that you can go easiest to hardest, and the variety of puzzles available.
Great way fo challenge myself and pass time.
Too hard, I play to relax. Too expensive.
replyContent: Hi Linda, there is a large range of difficulties to suit new and experienced Acrostics solvers. Try the Lovatt's puzzles to start with, or Penny Dell. Also, I'm always happy to refund any purchase - just use the Support link to get in touch. Thanks for giving it a try.  Cheers, Michael @ Egghead Games

content: Still hooked on Acrostics . Best puzzles ever!
replyContent: Thanks Carol, We're so glad you like it!  Happy puzzling, Drew

content: Challenging but fun. Really works the brain
Great fun. A few puzzles are too big to fit on the screen when keyboard is open.
replyContent: Thanks Susan. Note that you can "pinch" and "zoom" to help make the puzzle fit, as well as temporarily hiding various sections of the screen (e.g. the grid or clues). Cheers, Michael

content: The interface is easy to use. I really like the mixture of easy and hard puzzles.
Absolutely amazing the thought put into developing this. Best game ever.
Fun puzzles to keep you busy!
In four words.. Lo_e th_s fu_ _in' g_me... AWESOME.... Congrats!!!!!!
CynAcrostics volume 5 came out in print. I hope to see it become available in the app soon.
There's a good range of puzzle difficulty in the starter pack, but the extra puzzle packs after the initial 4 (for a total of 40 puzzles) can be a bit too steep.
Great Puzzle Fun!
Good change of pace for those who like crosswords.

They vary from not to tough to fairly difficult, depending on your experience. As a 63 year old life long crossword fan, they are challenging enough for most. Not so simple that they aren't fun while not being impossible to solve. One of my favorite apps.
acrostics are my fave, and this app rocks!
love them. need infinite amounts of them. please.
I love this app! So much more fun than plain crosswords, in my opinion. Wish the additional packages weren't so expensive :(
I really enjoy acrostics. Finally found one in the app store.
Awesome! I've always been addicted to acrostics!
more puzzles would be great!
replyContent:
Hi Ruthie, I just released an update with 8 more volumes. Six from Penny (Dell) Puzzles and 1 each from Acrostics by Cyn and Acrostica.

Happy puzzling!

Cheers, Mike @ Egghead Games

content: the customer service was fast and very friendly with helping me get a refund on this game. the only reason i didnt like this game is because it was different from the ones in the brain games book. also im not good at crossword type puzzle clues.
replyContent:
Updated: Thanks for getting in touch Elizabeth. I'm glad I was able to sort it out for you.

Was: A review for a different app perhaps?  This Cryptograms app is free. (If it was paid, I'd refund it anyway, because that's my policy for all my apps.) Feel free to email me at support@eggheadgames.com and we'll sort out what's going on. Cheers, Michael

content: good puzzles, good interface
Enjoyable puzzle game with samples at various difficulties.
overall fun and well done. wish there were more free puzzles but I enjoy it
awesome!
this app is pretty good if you enjoy acrostics but is hard to work with on a phone screen. acrostics need more room. if you have a tablet it would probably be much better.
The game works really well, and if you ever have any issues, their support team is amazing and super responsive!
Erasing errors count as hints.

Sorry... I can't leave a review right now, I am too busy being addicted to this amazing acrostics crossword puzzle app. Go away now... I'm trying to figure out if "tinhorn" is actually a word and if it fits this definition.....
Terrific game. I enjoy learning while I play. Cyn Morris really knows her business!
One of my favorite puzzle styles, with an interface that produces easy play. Given good puzzle sources, this should be a winner.
It's great! Not much ads as well.
replyContent: Thanks Kimberly! Indeed, there are NO ads in this app, nor any of our other apps.

content: No surprise so many 5 stars ratings. The devs are *right on it* with the tiniest suggestion for improvement. Emails have been answered at 2 in the morning. --I've loved all these games in mags for decades, but they are so much better electronically. No wasted time erasing or filling in squares. This is the only dev mags like Penny Press/ Dell will license to present their puzzles as an app, because of their super high standards. $2.99 each for new volumes is cheap for hours of fun.
Too hard to enjoy.
replyContent: Thanks Kim. Note there is a big range of difficulty between the 5 publishers. I recommend starting with the Lovatts Sampler and then Penny Dell. Next steps are Puzzle Baron, and existing Acrostics enthusiasts really love Acrostics by Cyn and Acrostica.  Cheers, Mike @ Egghead Games

content: Pretty good with just enough difficulty.
I love puzzle games. Puzzles are challanging.

Great app, challenging acrostics. My favorites are from Acrostica; I have a large vocabulary, so it's an unexpected pleasure to find as many as eight words I've never seen in a single Acrostica puzzle.
The only good acrostic app there is.
Love the themed puzzles. It makes them more solvable. Keep releasing new puzzles.

Addictive fun for the literati, could use some tweaking of the controls and 
options for how the letters are highlighted, but it is great now and can 
only get better...
It is challenging but fun.

This is the first acrostic app I've ever found and it's great fun. No 
complaints from me!
Good time killer
Boring...

I like the back and forth of acrostics. The only user interface annoyance 
is that the letter insertion point in the clues is fixed once clicked. As 
one scrolls through the clues, however, this spot is no longer visible and 
new typed letters go there, and not on the visible clue. Simple UI fix?: 
move the insertion point to the first unassigned letter on the topmost 
visible clue.
replyContent:
Thanks for the review Norm!  Hmm, so that's an interesting idea. I wonder how that affects people who scroll down to see what else is happening, but then wish continue where they were? And in 2/3 column mode, is it always the top left visible clue? I'll ponder this!

One thing we definitely want to change is to skip filled in letters.

Thanks, Mike

content: Bad set up and interface, sorry but too bad to be true.
replyContent: Hi Clive, thanks for taking the time to try it. Do you have any specifics?  It's hard to fit magazine size puzzles onto phone size screens, but we're always working to improve our app!  Perhaps you've played other word games and have some ideas? Please email us anytime: support@eggheadgames.com.

content: Love it
replyContent: Thanks Norma!  Glad you're enjoying them!!  Cheers, Mike @ Egghead Games

content: interface is painful
replyContent: Hi Alexander, do you have any suggestions?  It's hard to fit magazine size puzzles onto phone size screens, but we're always working to improve our app!  Perhaps you've played other word games that you've found easier?  You can reach us via email anytime at support@eggheadgames.com.  Thanks, Mike

content: It does not work, just force stopped everytime pfffft. useless.
replyContent: Update: We've found the cause and have just uploaded a new version that will fix this. Please give it another try when you see version 2.4.4 / 71 available. Thanks so much for letting us know, and apologies for the problem.  Cheers, Mike

content:
Very good app. Only enjoyed the pennypress ones though. Kind of 
disappointed there were only 10 that came with purchasing the app.
replyContent: Thanks Clifford, yes, everyone has their favourite publishers!  We provide 10 for each of the five publishers for 50 total, so you can try them all. FYI, people who enjoy Penny Press often enjoy Puzzle Baron too. BTW, we'll always happily refund any purchase that you don't like.  Cheers, Mike

content: Having fun. Good mix of easy to hard puzzles.

A wide range of third-party acrostic puzzles in a framework that that works 
well, even on a small phone screen. The developers are very responsive to 
bug reports and user suggestions. No subscription puzzles but I'll be 
asking them to consider adding the NYT for those of us who subscribe.

I enjoy the puzzles. But the keyboard needs left and right arrow keys, for 
skipping or backing up spaces. And it would be nice if it could skip filled 
spaces, like Shortyz crosswords does.
replyContent: Hi Cliff, thanks for those suggestions. We'd love to improve the keyboard support, and implement other ideas. Please email us at support@eggheadgames.com if you'd like to help us test these as we implement them.  Cheers, Mike

content: My favorite word puzzle app.  Best medium I've found for solving acrostic puzzles.  Highly recommended!
I'd like the option to view author and title but still a good challenge.
replyContent: Hi Clarice, I added this feature a couple of months ago after a similar request. While you're playing a puzzle it should be at the top left, in the title bar. I'd love to make it even better or fix it if it's not useful yet. Please use the Contact Support option in the app and I'll respond promptly! Thanks, Mike

content: Good game.

I have been doing acrostics for many years.  I love being able to take them with me wherever I go.  There is a great selection of puzzles of varying difficulty.  I only wish that new puzzles came out on a regular basis.  The puzzle prices are reasonable.
Love this game. Even when you have to look up a lot of clues, you learn things. It's so much fun to work the quote to help you get the bottom part, sometimes a lot of guess work.
Just bought this app and there is not one free puzzle to play?
replyContent: There are 50 puzzles included with the app, all available to play immediately. Just tap the Play button at the top of the screen to get started. Happy puzzling!

content: Just learned how to play acrostics game, thanks for making this game available on Android, stress buster to keep someone busy.
Why is there a cost for this app if you only get a limited amount of puzzles and then have to pay for more puzzles?
replyContent:
Hi Meg, great question! Because: 1. we have no ads or locked features, 2. acrostic puzzles take a LOT of time to make & fact check, 3. these are a niche puzzle with relatively few players, 4. actual support. 

See https://eggheadgames.com/blog/2016/3/29/value-is-a-conscious-choice

Cheers, Mike support@eggheadgames.com

(1 star, seriously?  üòû)

content: Best acrostic app. Too bad you have to pay to get new puzzles.
replyContent: Thanks Verle. Yes, we like free stuff too, but even if advertising could cover the costs of a niche puzzle like Acrostics, we'd rather work for you, not the Facebook or Google ad departments. See https://eggheadgames.com/blog/2016/3/29/value-is-a-conscious-choice. Happy puzzling!  Cheers, Mike

content: Awesome!
replyContent: Thanks Shannon!

content: Looking for this a long time
replyContent: Hi John, I'm so glad you found it!  üéâ  I wonder if there's some way we could have made it easier to find? Are there other key words that might help perhaps?  Love to hear any ideas via email at support@eggheadgames.com. Thanks, Mike

content: got addicted to this game but sometimes it is too hard because i m not a native
I have grown to love this type  of word game, even tho a lot of these clues were very hard and had to be looked up on the internet.
Best acrostic app so far. But why are additional  games so Expensive?
replyContent:
Thanks Paul!  Why?

1) each puzzle takes an author hours to make and cannot be easily "machine generated" - we split your payment directly with the authors

2) we don't clutter our apps with ads or spyware - https://eggheadgames.com/blog/2016/3/29/value-is-a-conscious-choice

3) acrostics are a niche puzzle (but shouldn't be!)

Cheers, Mike

content: I love these games!!  Just need to improve the split screen interface for use on cell phone and maybe add option to see first letter of clues or see puzzle name and author for more novice users.  But the earse error function is good for that.  Keep em coming!!
replyContent: Thanks Cheri!  Yes, phone screens are hard because they're so small compared to a magazine page!  You can toggle between various modes (e.g. clues only, grid only) and shrink/expand to best suit your device, or where you are in the game. If you have other ideas to make it fit better, please emails us: support@eggheadgames.com  We love ideas!

content: A great way to exercise the mind and while away the time.  Thank you for letting us experience this app for free.
Never done Acrostic puzzles before. This was the best paid app I've ever gotten for free. Thanks!
Usually one of the first puzzles I turn to in a puzzle magazine.  Really nice to have in Android form! Thank you for the free download!
replyContent:
Hi Brian, thanks for taking a moment to let everyone know. We're fortunate to have many of the best acrostic publishers working with us, so now you'll have lots of puzzles to choose from.

I'm so glad you found us and curious how? Please email support@eggheadgames.com if you have a moment to tell us. We're trying to get the word out!

Cheers, Mike

content: Fantastic cross word game for those requiring the old school feeling without the paper based mess.
replyContent:
Thanks for taking the time to write a review Malcolm. 

In case you're a newcomer to Egghead Games, we are PASSIONATE about the quality and support for our puzzles. If you ever have any questions or comments, just tap About - Contact Support and we'll respond promptly!

Cheers, Mike

content: Very entertaining.

content: Highly entertaining and addictive for those who enjoy challenging word games.

content: Love it! Could use a "show errors" type control.
replyContent: Thanks!  FYI, we do have an "Erase errors" button. This will remove errors and highlight the cells. Then you can tap "Undo" on the bottom left of the keyboard to put the letters back if you wish. Does that help, or is just a highlight better? Tap About - Contact Support to let us know. Cheers, Mike

If not, please email us at support@eggheadgames.com and we'll fix it! Thx, Mike @ Egghead Games

content: I really love acrostics. These are the first I've done online and I'm hooked! They are addictive, challenging and fun.

content: Incredibly satisfying to complete these puzzles!  Enough to keep you going for a bit until you need to buy more puzzles, and the layout and features are fun to use.  I'm addicted!
replyContent: Thanks so much! If you have any ideas on how to make the layout or features better, just tap the Help -> Contact Support link. We'd love to hear them. PS: Be sure to update and try the 10 new Lovatts puzzles included free in the latest update. Happy puzzling! Mike @ Egghead Games

content: Love it! Wish they gave you more freebie puzzles though.
replyContent: H Mica, thanks for those kind words!  I thought you'd like to know we just released a new update with 10 more puzzles, from the renowned Australian magazine Lovatts Puzzles. Just update, and tap Play üëç. Happy puzzling!

content: Either I just don't like acrostics, or these are particularly badly created ones. Person who voiced Steve McQueen from cars? Is this a test of my ability to Google?

content: The app is designed nicely, and the puzzles are engaging. The add-on puzzles are expensive, as apps go, and no indication is given of how many additional puzzles are in the packs!
replyContent: Hi Patrick, thx for the review! Yes, niche puzzles requiring human authoring are expensive, whether in an app or in print. I take your point about the puzzle count - FYI, it's almost always 50 puzzles. This displays in the final confirmation after you tap buy but before "Confirm", but we'll make that more obvious üëç. Cheers, Mike

content: Great game with clean interface. Really like it. Glad there are more puzzle options now.

content: I really enjoy acrostics! They are probably my favorite puzzles and these are fun and challenging without being frustrating.

replyContent: Thanks Mickey!  Contact us anytime if you have questions or suggestions. Happy puzzling. Mike - support@eggheadgames.com

content: Didn't like the sample pack and found it a bit pricey to have to immediately pay again to get my favourite penny puzzles but great fun nonetheless!
replyContent: Hi Jetske, thanks for the review and the email follow-up to clarify. We try to provide a range of puzzles, so it can be tricky to get the right balance. Feedback like yours helps a lot. Cheers, Mike - support@eggheadgames.com

content: I really can't recommend Egghead Games enough. Acrostics are fun puzzles and this app is great. The app has lots of options but is very intuitive and well laid-out. You can control sounds within the app, select different puzzle layouts for difficulty/preference, and even change font sizes. Every app has a guide both for using the app and doing the puzzle. Egghead apps NEVER ask for phone permissions for things they don't need, such as location, speaker/mic/camera, or contacts access, you don't need a social media account to play, and you don't need to connect anything to get any perks. I wish more devs would follow their example but I'm overjoyed they do business this way. I found some errors in the Acrostica starter pack and let them know about it; customer service is impeccable. Mike M. took my input and made it right. Their apps are usually perfect and on the off chance something isn't, they fix it! Lots of fun for less than the price of a coffee, you'd think they'd charge more!
replyContent: Thanks Nancy!  And thanks for letting us know via our email at support@eggheadgames.com - we really do want to take care of every problem and it's nice to get a chance. (Plus our customers are wonderful people - I guess it's something about the type of folks that love hard puzzles!)  Cheers, Mike @ Egghead Games

content: I do crostics all the time on paper, now I can take them anywhere with me!
replyContent: Thanks Michelle. Happy puzzling!

content: I had a blast with this game for a couple weeks but it stopped loading about a week ago. It won't load at all. Help?
replyContent: Sherri, please email us at support@eggheadgames.com. MANY apologies for this. We'll work with you to get this going again!  This is the only report we've had, but if others are having problems, please do the same. We want to get this right! Thanks - Mike @ Egghead Games

content: Handled complex agency appeals. Wrote the agency's published opinions and orders. This app appeals to my puzzle solving interests. It is fun, features interesting quotes, but could be more challenging.

For harder puzzles, please give the new CynAcrostics puzzles a try (the first 4 of Acrostics by Cyn Starter puzzles are from that series), or the Puzzle Baron puzzles. Set the Play order to "harder first" for added brain strain. Cheers, Mike - support@eggheadgames.com

content: This app went from nearly unplayable on my tablet to my new favorite.  Can't wait to see what is next.

We're working hard on this and are proud to be recently chosen by publishers like PennyPress, Acrostics by Cyn & Acrostica to distribute their puzzles, in addition to the excellent Puzzle Baron puzzles of course.  If you have improvement ideas, email us anytime at  support@eggheadgames.com.

content: A bit awkward but still fun

content: After first install, app didn't work properly on my samsung 10.1 notebook. Very convenient!
replyContent: Hi Teri, thanks for that update. With your help, I think we've fixed this for good, and all devices! Thx, Mike @ Egghead Games

content: I love this app. I can work Anacrostics wherever I go, and the developers keep rolling out improvements! Thanks for making me feel like my opinion is valid!

content: I may be in the minority, but I liked the old keyboard a LOT better.

We've done a new much improved implementation that we hope is worth 5 stars again! Email us anytime: support@eggheadgames.com. Thanks, Mike

content: You get 50 free puzzles which are well done and worth the download for that reason, but while I understand the concept of paying for games, 84 dollars seems a bit much for the full version. That's quite an annoying main menu screen. We should at least have an option to remove the rest of this long list of 28 add-on 2.99 volumes if we buy one volume.  Also there seems to be no way to do the early puzzles again to try and get higher star rankings without deleting progress on all 50 at once.
replyContent: Hi Kam, thanks for that review! We just released a new version that restores the ability to reset an individual puzzle, along with the ability to view a completed puzzle's clues etc. Edit: And the latest version now hides that long list of $84 volumes. Thanks for pointing that out!  Cheers, Mike - support@eggheadgames.com, email us anytime üòÄ

content: Many nice features. Love the erase errors options. Just challenging enough to stay interesting. Well done! Have recommend to other puzzle lovers.
replyContent: Thanks MikkiJo!  We just released a large update. Please let us know if you have any questions about it - thanks!  Mike - support@eggheadgames.com

content: Very addicting, and fun to play whenever you have 5 minutes or 5 hours!

Virtually no errors in the clues of the first couple hundred puzzles, and a decent level of literacy: some basic notions of foreign languages help, and there aren't too many sports surnames as clues. The texts excerpted range from Plato to self-help  (more of the latter).
replyContent: Thanks for that review Sebastian!  Cheers,  Mike @ Egghead Games

content: These are the absolutely best.
replyContent: Thanks Kathy, glad you're enjoying them!

content: Well done, with hints and ability to erase errors... This app has spoiled me for paper acrostics.
replyContent: Thanks Ann. Yes, the trick is to still keep it challenging while removing some of the erasing. Happy puzzling!

content: Sometimes have to hit the letters a few times, but otherwise fun.
replyContent: Thanks Pam. We're looking at switching to the standard device keyboard. It takes up a little more room, but it removes any detection problems and also lets you use the "muscle memory" that the standard keyboard builds up.

content: I love acrostics and these have afforded me many hours of pleasure
replyContent: Thanks Reverend. We take a lot of pride in the app and its puzzles, so it's great to get this feedback.

content: Would like it to sync between devices?

content: Very nice - I love acrostics and these are great. Tapping to enter letters can be frustrating, though
replyContent: Hi Tom, a quick note that as far as we know we've (finally!) eliminated all the tapping problems. Please give the latest version a try and let us know if there are any problems. Thanks!  Mike - support@eggheadgames.com

content: I love acrostics, they combine two other puzzle types I love: cryptograms and crosswords. These are challenging enough to not be boring, but not so impossible so as to be too frustrating to do. Totally worth the small cost - it's much cheaper than buying the same amount of puzzles in a book or magazine.
If you love acrostics you will enjoy this app. I spend hours at a time doing these!
Puzzles are interesting, in fact, I read a new book because of one of them. The process works like clockwork. Terrific App!

There are certain word puzzles that I love and this is one of them. I have kept checking and finally this one popped up. I am throughly enjoying it and looking forward to many more hours of pleasure. Well done!
It can take a few taps to make entries but otherwise very fun
Very disappointed.
replyContent: Hi Susan, as discussed via email, we think we've fixed this with the latest update and would love to hear back. Of course you've received a full refund in the meantime!  Thanks, Mike @ Egghead Games

content: Not for beginners - though it's nice that they have hints
I wish there was an option to keep words from wrapping from one line to the next. Other than that, great app.
Love this app!

These games are actually challenging (sorta on par with Dell puzzle mags), unlike most of the freebies so it's worth it for me, tho I agree with other reviewers that so much shouldn't be charged for subsequent vols. I also don't really care for the timer and the rating of "very slow" I am greeted with at the completion of every puzzle. I'm not in a race; I work them at my leisure.
I really love acrostics...I just wish I didn't have to pay $2.99 every time I wanted to get more. I think if you pay $2.99 for the first 50 puzzles, it should be cheaper for the ones after that.
Very addicting!
Enjoyed puzzles. Interface way better than competitor.  More, please!
Great app for anyone that is a fan of word games

It's just like the books I used to order from Penny Press, with some added advantages including deleting all mistakes and hints.  The puzzles have difficulty ratings so you can choose a quick one or spend some time working your brain.  Fun!
A great way for word nerds to pass the time. Especially good for trips.

Its bad enough that they charge you for the app when its available to play on line for free but everytime I try to click on a link it crashes. I can't even go to the site to buy more puzzles (again its free to play online). So now that I have solved the 50 puzzles that it came with, the apps is completely useless to me and a royal waste of money.

Love this game!  Very easy and customizable interface, free hints, ability to undo and even erase all errors in the puzzle. And the best thing is you can erase the records and start over to improve your score!  I highly recommend this terrific game app.

A liitle pricey. I don't mind paying 2.99 for the first set but subsequent sets should be less. Also, would like option to play without timer. I play these games to relax. But one time I did beat the Expert score and only rated Average. What's up with that?

The puzzles I have tried so far are pretty good, but I can't tell much difference between the difficulty levels.   I wish the puzzles were longer like the ones in the Penny mags.   The interface is frustrating, it's hard to choose a particular square, it often takes several presses before it registers a touch. There should be an option to skip completed squares when entering letters.   I will keep playing and hope for interface improvements from the author.
I luv Acrostics.
Good job!
Enjoying these crostics. They are a little more challenging than I'm used to, but at least there's no penalty when I need to use a hint.
A little on the difficult side but then I like a challenge. Good game.
Game isn't too easy or too hard. Love the automatic fill in when u add to either the quote or the clues. Easier to change positions on tablet screen than on phone.
Biggest flaw: having to repeatedly tap keys to keep going

I like the app but can't give it a 5 star rating because I can't review the puzzle once its complete and it contiually rates my speed as "very slow". Seriously, who are all these people who can do a puzzle in 10 minutes!  Update: something is definitely messed up with the timing bell curve. I finished a puzzle 24 seconds longer than my husband, I used zero hints and he used 127 hints, he gets an average rating and I get very slow!
Lots of entertainment. Only problem I have with it is that the acrostics tend to be a bit easy.
It's pretty good
I love doing these types of puzzles in the sunday paper.  Now I can do it anytime.  Great app!

I have completed 2 volumes, or 100 puzzles  everything is 1-3 stars, I am assuming on a difficulty scale of 1-5. Some repeat clues show up and it's pretty lame to rely on Roman numerals for filler. But I downloaded volume 3 so it can't be all bad ;-)
Puzzles are challenging, app works great.
Fabulous work on the interface. This makes puzzling on paper obsolete! I love that you can buy more levels - I hope the developers continue to add more puzzles, as I will keep buying!
Have thoroughly enjoyed these anachrostics and will continue to purchase as long as there are new puzzles available.
Fun way to challenge your brain. Nicely done app.  I would recommend it to any word puzzle geeks like myself.
Great app!
This is a great app. Interesting solutions. Good clues. Good use of solving words. Down to earth. Not outlandish or silly. Good fun.
I've been hoping a developer would produce an anacrostic app...and I'm so happy this Saturday morning to find  one.

An acrostic starts with a quote, with the letters rearranged into a series of clued words. The clues and quotes are excellent, and 50 acrostics come with the starting set. More packs of 50 are available. Very well done.
